member.name: T:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleSwitchStyle
member.summary: Toggle switch handle style

member.name: F:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleSwitchStyle.Ellipse
member.summary: Ellipse handle style

member.name: F:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleSwitchStyle.Circle
member.summary: Circle handle style

member.name: F:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleSwitchStyle.Square
member.summary: Square handle style

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButton.InnerElementReference
member.summary: Exposes a Blazor of the wrapped around HTML element. It can be used e.g. for JS interop, etc.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButton.OnColor
member.summary: Sets the `style` of the `background-color` when button is ON (bool value `true`). Use HTML specified: **Color Names**, **RGB**, **HEX** or with **HSL** values.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButton.OffColor
member.summary: Sets the `style` of the `background-color` when button is OFF (bool value `false`). Use HTML specified: **Color Names**, **RGB**, **HEX** or with **HSL** values.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButton.HoverColor
member.summary: Sets the `style` of the `background-color` when button is hovered over with mouse. Use HTML specified: **Color Names**, **RGB**, **HEX** or with **HSL** values.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButton.Content
member.summary: Required HTML content to show in Toggle button.It can be any text or image (please use transparent background image).

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButton.Checked
member.summary: Represents Toggle button value: **ON**: `true`, **OFF**: `false`.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButton.Height
member.summary: HTML element height in `px`.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButton.Width
member.summary: HTML element Width in `px`.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButton.Disabled
member.summary: Determines whether the rendered HTML element should be disabled or not.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButton.OnToggleChanged
member.summary: Callback function called when component toggled. Actual toggle `Value` is the callback `bool` parameter.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButton.AllOtherAttributes
member.summary: Blazor capture for any unmatched HTML attributes.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButtonGroup.InnerElementReference
member.summary: Exposes a Blazor of the wrapped around HTML element. It can be used e.g. for JS interop, etc.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButtonGroup.ToggleButtons
member.summary: Required list of ToggleButtons components. See usage example.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButtonGroup.Disabled
member.summary: Determines whether all the rendered HTML elements should be disabled or not.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButtonGroup.MustToggled
member.summary: Determines whether at least one must be toggled all the time or all buttons can be Off.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButtonGroup.OnToggleChanged
member.summary: Callback function called when component toggled. Actual toggled (selected) button is the callback parameter. When nothing selected value is `NULL`.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButtonGroup.ActiveButton
member.summary: Returns currently active "toggled" element ref also can be used to set which button should be active "toggled".

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButtonGroup.ButtonCount
member.summary: Returns the number of int the given `ToggleButtonGroup`.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButtonGroup.Buttons
member.summary: Returns all the reference added to the group. It can be used for activating any of the elements.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleButtonGroup.AllOtherAttributes
member.summary: Blazor capture for any unmatched HTML attributes.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleSwitch.InnerElementReference
member.summary: Exposes a Blazor of the wrapped around HTML element. It can be used e.g. for JS interop, etc.

member.summary: Sets the `background-color` when switch is ON (bool value `true`). Use HTML specified: **Color Names**, **RGB**, **HEX** or with **HSL** values.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Toggle.ToggleSwitch.OffColor

member.summary: Determines whether the rendered HTML element should be disabled or not.

member.summary: Callback function called when component toggled. Actual toggle `Value` is the callback `bool` parameter.
